title: ECG Arrhythmia Classification Based on the Fast Ant Colony Clustering Algorithm with Improved Spatiotemporal Feature Perception Ability
details: S Qin, L Liu, X Wang, N Dong, N Li, Q Zheng - Heliyon, 2024
abstract: Electrocardiograph (ECG) is one of the most critical physiological signals used for arrhythmia diagnosis. In recent years, ECG arrhythmia classification devices consisting of multi-module sensors, clustering algorithms and neural networks play …
